mapper.select: /* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - empInfo(사원정보가져오기) */ SELECT XX.EMP_EMNO AS empEmno /*사원번호*/ ,XX.EMP_NAME AS empName /*성명*/ ,XX.RANK_NAME AS rankName /*직위/직급명*/ ,XX.DEPT_CODE AS deptCode /*부서코드*/ ,DEPT_NAME AS deptName /*부서명*/ FROM( SELECT X.*, RANK_NAME FROM( SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_EMNO = #{emno} )X, RANK R WHERE X.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE )XX, DEPARTMENT D WHERE XX.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE
mapper.insert: /* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - individualInsert(개인일정 등록 ) */ INSERT INTO INDIVIDUAL_PLAN ( EMP_EMNO /*사원번호*/ ,INPN_TIT /*제목*/ ,INPN_CNTN /*내용*/ ,INPN_STRT_DATE /*시작날짜*/ ,INPN_END_DATE /*종료날짜*/ ,INPN_REG_DATE /*등록날짜*/ ,INPN_UPDT_DATE /*수정날짜*/ ,INPN_DEL_YN /*삭제여부*/ ) VALUES ( #{emno}, /*사원번호*/ #{title}, /*제목*/ #{content}, /*내용*/ #{startDate}, /*시작날짜*/ #{endDate}, /*종료날짜*/ #{createDate}, /*등록날짜*/ #{updateDate}, /*수정날짜*/ #{delYN} /*삭제여부*/ )

/* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - departmentInsert(부서일정 등록 ) */ INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT_PLAN ( DEPT_CODE /*부서코드*/ ,EMP_EMNO /*사원번호*/ ,DEPN_TIT /*제목*/ ,DEPN_CNTN /*내용*/ ,DEPN_STRT_DATE /*시작날짜*/ ,DEPN_END_DATE /*종료날짜*/ ,DEPN_REG_DATE /*등록날짜*/ ,DEPN_UPDT_DATE /*수정날짜*/ ,DEPN_DEL_YN /*삭제여부*/ ) VALUES ( #{deptCode}, /*부서코드*/ #{emno}, /*사원번호*/ #{title}, /*제목*/ #{content}, /*내용*/ #{startDate}, /*시작날짜*/ #{endDate}, /*종료날짜*/ #{createDate}, /*등록날짜*/ #{updateDate}, /*수정날짜*/ #{delYN} /*삭제여부*/ )
mapper.select: /* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - individuaSchedule(사원일정가져오기) */ SELECT INPN_TIT AS title /*제목*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(INPN_STRT_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS start /*시작날짜*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(INPN_END_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS end /*종료날짜*/ ,'#378006' as color /*가상컬럼*/ ,'10' as id /*가상컬럼*/ FROM INDIVIDUAL_PLAN WHERE EMP_EMNO = #{emno} AND INPN_DEL_YN = 'N'

/* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - departmentSchedule(부서일정가져오기) */ SELECT DEPN_TIT AS title /*제목*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(DEPN_STRT_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS start /*시작날짜*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(DEPN_END_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS end /*종료날짜*/ ,'20' as id /*가상컬럼*/ FROM DEPARTMENT_PLAN WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND DEPN_DEL_YN = 'N'

/* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - individuaDetail(개인일정상세보기) */ SELECT INPN_SEQ AS inpnSeq /*일련번호*/ ,EMP_EMNO AS empEmno /*사원번호*/ ,INPN_TIT AS inpnTit /*제목*/ ,INPN_CNTN AS inpnCntn /*내용*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(INPN_STRT_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS inpnStrtDate /*시작날짜*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(INPN_END_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS inpnEndDate /*종료날짜*/ ,INPN_REG_DATE AS inpnRegDate /*등록날짜*/ ,INPN_UPDT_DATE AS inpnUpdtDate /*수정날짜*/ ,INPN_DEL_YN AS inpnDelYn /*삭제여부*/ FROM INDIVIDUAL_PLAN WHERE EMP_EMNO = #{emno} AND INPN_STRT_DATE = #{start} AND INPN_END_DATE = #{end}

/* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - departmentDetail(부서일정상세보기) */ SELECT DEPN_SEQ AS depnSeq /*일련번호*/ ,DEPT_CODE AS deptCode /*부서코드*/ ,EMP_EMNO AS empEmno /*사원번호*/ ,DEPN_TIT AS depnTit /*제목*/ ,DEPN_CNTN AS depnCntn /*내용*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(DEPN_STRT_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS depnStrtDate /*시작날짜*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(DEPN_END_DATE,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s") AS depnEndDate /*종료날짜*/ ,DEPN_REG_DATE AS depnRegDate /*등록날짜*/ ,DEPN_UPDT_DATE AS depnUpdtDate /*수정날짜*/ ,DEPN_DEL_YN AS depnDelYn /*삭제여부*/ FROM DEPARTMENT_PLAN WHERE DEPN_STRT_DATE = #{start} AND DEPN_END_DATE = #{end}
mapper.update: /* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - individuaDelete(개인일정삭제) */ UPDATE INDIVIDUAL_PLAN SET INPN_DEL_YN = "Y" ,INPN_UPDT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y%m%d%H%i%s") WHERE INPN_SEQ = #{seq}
/* /personnel/schedule/scheduleMapper.xml - departmentDelete(부서일정삭제) */ UPDATE DEPARTMENT_PLAN SET DEPN_DEL_YN = "Y" ,DEPN_UPDT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y%m%d%H%i%s") WHERE DEPN_SEQ = #{seq}
